author: Special Correspondent
text:
Volunteers of the People’s Welfare Front (PWF) comprising the two Left parties, MDMK and VCK staged a demonstration here on Tuesday flaying the government and the Tiruchi Corporation for not providing the required basic amenities in Tiruchi City.

Demands

Led by the CPI-M state committee member S. Sridhar, they urged the government to establish an integrated bus stand in Tiruchi, upgrade the Mahatma Gandhi Government Hospital on a par with the All India Institute of Medical Sciences with deployment of more experts, implement underground drainage system in the new areas attached to corporation, steps to prevent mixing of sewage water in the Cauvery at Koraiyar, Kudamurutti, Rettai Vaikkal and Kottai Vaikkal, and appoint more workers to clear garbage quickly and expedite flyover work at Tiruchi Junction.
title: PWF members stage demonstration
